template.name: New SilverStripe Controller
template.description: A new SilverStripe Controller extending ContentController

templates.template:
<?php
class ${file_name} extends Extension {
    /**
     * Adds the extra statics for this extension
     * @return {array} Returns a multi-dimentional array defining extra statics and their values
     */
    public function extraStatics() {
        ${cursor}
    }
    
    /**
     * Updates the CMS fields adding the fields defined in this extension
     * @param {FieldSet} $$fields Field Set that new fields will be added to
     */
    public function updateCMSFields(FieldSet &$$fields) {
        
    }
}
?>

template.name: New Top Level SilverStripe Template
template.description: A new Top Level SilverStripe Template

templates.template:
$$MetaTags(false) <% base_tag %> <% require themedCSS(layout) %> <% require themedCSS(typography) %> <% require themedCSS(form) %>
$$Layout
<% if IsAdmin %> $$SilverStripeNavigator <% end_if %>
